name: V. “STOLEN SOUL”
description:
5/8 from “Nightmares” collection.
It’s a collection created to celebrate Halloween that revives the most common and darkest nightmares that haunt the human being. 8 collectible card amulets that explain the most terrifying fears and give protection to those who have them.

Description of the piece:
When you dream about a demon, it’s indicating great harm that may arise in the future. It means that you are occupied with negative thoughts or someone in your life is bringing you down emotionally.
When a demon spirit tries to take your soul in your dream it could speak of your fear of falling out of your place. A fear of being misled, doing wrong and losing spiritual protection.Or a fear of being attacked for being good. Your spirit may be trying to warn you of a relationship that it can see beneath the facade that you can't. It could indicate you are in danger and you don't want to see it. Even a feeling of helplessness in some situation could be causing it.

1157x1600px

Full story here: nft.matiasmarano.com/nightmares
